channel.title: How can i change the exp of smithing? and fm and wc
channel.description: i need more exp from emm all things :p like mith chain body gives 50k exp and not 1k or soemthing

item.title: How can i change the exp of smithing? and fm and wc
item.dc:creator: @billy00 billy00
item.description:
@billy00 wrote:

Go to your client.java and find this kind of message:

{
sendMessage(“You search for your needle…Now were did I put that needle?”);
addSkillXP((70playerLevel[1]), 1);
addSkillXP((20playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionTimer = 20;
setAnimation(0x320);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Now change this: addSkillXP((70*playerLevel[1]), 1); to something else lower than what it is…

Compile+Run and pray for no errors…Lol

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change the exp of smithing? and fm and wc
